special_text:
[+2]: Mill up to three cards. Return a card milled this way from your graveyard to your hand.
[-3]: Until end of turn, target creature gets -X/-X or +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
[-8]: Target creature you control gains deathtouch, indestructible and  “Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, that player loses the game.” [i](This lasts indefinitely.)[/i]
